author: ET Bureau
title: Government to expand e-NAM to 1000 mandis
description: Agriculture minister Narendra Singh Tomar that during current Covid19 lockdown, the government several initiatives on e-NAM platform to decongest wholesale markets and to make supply chain agile.
content: New Delhi: The government plans to expand the coverage of digital agriculture market - e-NAM - to 1000 mandis. Agriculture minister Narendra Singh Tomar said that the government will add 415 mandis to e-NAM platform to expand its coverage form existing 585 ma… [+1717 chars]
